definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Here is an example: The universe is like a pocket watch.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有個例子，宇宙像一個懷錶。

sentences.english: I’m very proud of my gold pocket watch.
sentences.chinese: 我對我的那塊金懷錶引以爲傲。

sentences.english: I'm very proud of my gold pocket watch.
sentences.chinese: 我爲自己的金懷錶感到很自豪。

sentences.english: Jack carefully unlocked the box. There inside he found a beautiful gold pocket watch.
sentences.chinese: 他小心翼翼地打開盒子，裏面是一塊漂亮的金懷錶。

sentences.english: Please Turn Your Attention to the Fellow with the Twirling Pocket Watch.
sentences.chinese: 請大家注意看那個在擺動懷錶的傢伙。

sentences.english: She drew out a little gold-faced watch on an enamelled chain.
sentences.chinese: 她取出一隻金面小懷錶，表上繫着彩飾的錶鏈。

sentences.english: To this day， I carry a pocket watch.
sentences.chinese: 直到今天，我還裝着一隻懷錶。

sentences.english: Izmaylov: My first book was "The Pocket Watch."
Great hypnotists do not need to swing a pocket watch from a chain.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的催眠術士並不需要甩動懷錶的鏈子。

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1

definition: perpetual calendar/ten thousand year calendar/Islamic calendar introduced to Yuan China by Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)
